name: hbralrimi
params: setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1

stmt.origin: sylibr(w0, wral(s0, c0, w1), wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wral(s0, c0, w1))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1)))
-| wb(wral(s0, c0, w1), wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wral(s0, c0, w1))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1)))
-| wb(wral(s0, c0, w1), wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1)))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, w0))
-| wi(w0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wral(s0, c0, w1))
-| wb(wral(s0, c0, w1), wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1)))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, w0))
-| wi(w0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1))

body.origin: |- wb(wral(s0, c0, w1), wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wral(s0, c0, w1))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, w0))
-| wi(w0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1))

comment: Inference from Theorem 19.21 of [Margaris] p. 90 (restricted quantifier version). This theorem contains the common proof steps for ~ ralrimi and ~ ralrimiv . Its main advantage over these two is its minimal references to axioms. The proof is extracted from NM's previous work. (Contributed by Wolf Lammen, 4-Dec-2019.)
